title: Lesson 24
paragraph: Collaboration and roles are crucial in team work. Involving colleagues, committing to tasks, and imposing structured excerpts ensures efficiency and success.

words.example: I met my colleague for lunch.
She insisted on completing the project herself.
The project will involve multiple departments.
